Key Match Events: The Spurs were able to steal a win in Denver with a 113-110 final score, as San Antonio bounced back from a weak third quarter to secure a pivotal win.
Post-Match Reflections: Jokic has high praise for the young Spurs phenom: 'I think he's better this year than last year and I think he's gonna get even better. I think he's a special player, one of a kind, [and] will be remembered forever.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wembanyama currently ranks in the top 10 in the league for scoring, top 15 in rebounding, and leads the league in blocks by more than a block per game.
Others: Wembanyama has a shot at earning All-NBA First Team honors in year two.
